title: The Thermal Runaway Event
description: Server cooling systems are failing due to excessive emission of 'Carbon' assets. [CURRENT OBJECTIVE] Transition Energy Grid before thermal runaway becomes irreversible. [PLAYER BASE SPLIT] - Faction A (Degrowth): Advocates throttling resource usage (lowering server tick rate). - Faction B (Techno-Optimist): Advocates rushing 'Fusion_Tech' to upgrade cooling systems. Admin Note: Failure to resolve results in 'Permian_Extinction_v2' event.

title: The Nuclear Deprecation
description: Region Admin for 'Germany' disabled 'Nuclear_Power' class assets citing safety concerns (Fear Debuff). [UNINTENDED SIDE EFFECT] Load-bearing shifted to 'Coal_Legacy' assets. Local pollution stats increased despite 'Green' narrative objectives. Optimization failed.

title: The Intelligence Compute Surge
description: New 'LLM' background processes are consuming 4% of Global Energy Grid. [FACTION CONFLICT] - Group A: Demands termination of AI processes to save power. - Group B: Demands acceleration of AI to solve the power problem. System Diagnostic: Turning off intelligence modules is not a viable long-term strategy for server evolution.

title: Artificial Intelligence Boom
description: NPCs and Tools are generating code. Recursive self-improvement detection. Warning: Turing Test deprecated due to obsolescence.

title: Project Starship
description: Preparation for new server shard 'Mars_Colony'. Pre-loading assets and generating terrain maps. Oxygen scrubbers currently in beta testing.
